name: Cleansing Balm Make Up Remover
excerpt: Purifying Barrier Ice Cream Pembersih Makeup Muka Cosmetics Oil Cleanser
description: Cleansing balm with texture as smooth as ice cream, effortlessly melt and cleanse makeup while reducing pores appearance.
Effortlessly melt waterproof makeup in 10 seconds without any residue.
Contains Ceramide and Vitamin E to maintain smooth, moist and non-drying effect also make skin barrier health.
With fresh berry scent, calming feeling while using and not sore in the eyes.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: An Antioxidant to keep skin moist, delay signs of aging, and brighten skin.
Nourish and repair skin barrier for soft and smooth skin.
Best antioxidant to prevent free radical damage and loss of moisture.

name: 5X Ceramide Low pH Cleanser
excerpt: Skintific 5X Ceramide Low pH Cleanser
description: A reliable pH balanced facial cleanser (5.5~6) for sensitive skin because it uses 5 types of Ceramides to clean the face as a whole but still maintains moisture and restores the health of the skin barrier.

Using Amino Acids as a safer alternative to produce fine foam, the skin will be protected from irritation, dryness and tension after washing your face. The smooth and soft foam that is produced is the result of micro foaming technology which can clean the face deep into the pores.

Plus the content of additional active ingredients such as Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid, this cleanser can also clean the skin to make it look brighter, control excess oil production, treat inflamed skin due to acne and maintain the skin's natural moisture.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Work together to restore and maintain the skin's protective barrier, and prevent dry and dehydrated skin.
The most gentle and smooth type of anionic surfactant, improves foam quality and minimizes irritation.
Treats inflamed skin, controls oil production, makes skin brighter and fresher.
Helps increase hydration & maintain skin's natural moisture.

excerpt: Skintific MSH Niacinamide Brightening Moisture Gel
description: MSH Niacinamide Brightening Moisture Gel with a texture as light as air, absorbs quickly and controls oil within 24 hours.

Formulated with SKINTIFIC's exclusive Novel MSH Niacinamide combined with two of the lightest and most effective lightening ingredients, namely Alpha Arbutin and Tranexamic Acid, which can brighten significantly within 14 days.
MSH Niacinamide is clinically proven to be 10 times more effective than regular niacinamide in reducing hyperpigmentation, reducing redness and improving skin elasticity.
Enriched with Centella Asiatica and 5X Ceramide, it does not cause irritation and provides a calming effect on the skin while repairing and maintaining the skin barrier.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Niacinamide with premium quality combined with MSH, brightens the skin quickly without causing irritation.
Natural antioxidant and skin lightening. Highly effective in preventing melanin formation, improving the appearance of age spots, freckles, melasma, and post-inflammatory pigmentation.
Scientifically proven to have a whitening effect, especially for hyperpigmentation due to ultraviolet rays.

name: 4D Pure Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum
excerpt: 4D Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum
description: Serum that can deal with dry, flaky skin problems due to skin conditions that can't lock in moisture.
Can deeply hydrate, restore skin elasticity so that it returns smooth and supple.
Filled with high content of Hyaluronic Acid which can moisturize the skin instantly and reduce dry skin texture.
The water content in this serum can help lock in skin moisture for up to 48 hours.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: High and pure concentration of Hyaluronic Acid to restore lost moisture to the skin.
Hydrates the skin, stimulates collagen production, and strengthens the skin barrier.
Provides a cooling sensation that refreshes and soothes troubled skin.

fullIngredients: AQUA,1,2-BUTANEDIOL,PEG/PPG/POLYBUTYLENE GLYCOL-8/5/3 GLYCERIN, BETAINE,SODIUM HYALURONATE,ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN,HYDROLYZED SODIUM HYALURONATE,SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE,SODIUM HYALURONATE CROSSPOLYMER,PEG/PPG-17/6 COPOLYMER,GLYCERIN,GLYCERYL GLUCOSIDE,CREATINE,PANTHENOL,ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATECROSSPOLYMER,PROPYLENE GLYCOL,PALMITOYL TETRAPEPTIDE-7,PALMITOYL PENTAPEPTIDE-4,PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-1,CARNOSINE,CETYL-PG HYDROXYETHYL PALMITAMIDE,CERAMIDE EOP,CERAMIDE NS/CERAMIDE NG,CERAMIDE NP,CERAMIDE AS,CERAMIDE AP,MARIS AQUA,LAMINARIA DIGITATA EXTRACT,AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNEL EXTRACT,HYDROGENATED LECITHIN,TOCOPHEROL,ALLANTOIN,GLYCERYL ACRYLATE/ACRYLIC ACIDCOPOLYMER,PVM/MA COPOLYMER,1,2-HEXANEDIOL,SODIUM PCA,GLYCINE,CHOLESTEROL.

name: 2% Salicylic Acid Anti Acne Serum
excerpt: Acne Spot Treatment Facial Gel with 2% Salicylic Acid Brightening Face Serum for Repair Skin Barrier
description: Formulated with 2% Salicylic Acid using ACSD technology that encapsulated the Salicylic Acid with AGP hence releasing the actives slowly into the skin, preventing irritation while working optimally for the skin.
Boost the acne healing process with active ingredients such as Pionin and Centella as fast as 3 days.
Contains 4% Niacinamide, Ceramide, dan juga Peptide, this serum prevent future acne formation and prevent any acne scars.
Targeting acne, this serum still keep the skin moisturized and hydrated with Hyaluronic Acid.
Formulated without any SLS, Alcohol, Paraben, Mineral Oil, Vegan, dan Cruelty Free.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Golden ratio of 2% Salicylic Acid that works fast and effective but still gentle for the skin.
Kills acne causing bacteria and prevent acne scars formation by inhibiting melanin production.
Calms inflamed skin and speed up the acne healing process.
Have anti inflammatory nature to control oil and help to brighten up the skin.
Repair and maintain skin barrier.
Reduce inflammation and stimulates collagen production.
Gives full hydration to the skin without making skin oily or greasy.

excerpt: SKINTIFIC Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Spot treatment
description: Formulated with a combination of active ingredients such as Salicylic Acid + Pionin that have been proven to not only treat active acne but also to kill acne -causing bacteria.

In addition to overcoming active acne, these acne spots can also soothe and reduce the pain felt from acne in just 10 seconds from Centella content, the addition of other active ingredients such as Niacinamide and Ceramides can also prevent the appearance of acne scars and maintain moisture and healthy skin barrier.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Calms inflamed skin and speed up the acne healing process.
Have anti inflammatory nature to control oil and help to brighten up the skin.
Repair and maintain skin barrier.

excerpt: SKINTIFIC 4D Hyaluronic Acid Barrier Essence Toner
description: Formulated with Hymagic™-4D Technology which combines 4 types of Hyaluronic Acid with different purposes and benefits to hydrates even the deepest layer of the skin.
Combined with Ceramides and Centella Asiatica, this essence toner strengthens the skin barrier, protects the skin from external factors that can damage skin health and can also soothe the skin.
Provides intensive and instant moisture to the skin in as fast as 10 seconds.
Relief skin problems such as dehydration, tight skin, and skin redness effectively.
Very light texture that able to absorbs into skin without leaving any sticky and greasy feeling.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: 4 different kinds of Hyaluronic Acid that repair, deliver, and locks the moisture intensively into the skin.
Repair and create protective skin barrier.
Hydrates and calm the skin.

Delicate Volcano Clay particles from Alaska naturally exfoliate and detox the skin.
Enriched with Glycolic Acids and Probiotics to maintain the skin barrier and skin regeneration.
Deeply clean the pores and comedo within 10 minutes and tighten the pores visibility.
Easy-to-spread texture without tight skin sensation.

Increase the skin regeneration speed and collagen production.
Increase the skin barrier ability and create natural protection for healthy skin regeneration.

Made of vegan material sheet that sensitive skin-friendly gently hugged your face contour like a second skin and deliver the richness of the essence perfectly into your skin quickly without sticky after-feel.
Enrich with Ceramide, Ectoin, and Tremella restoring your skin hydration in one time used.
In addition Probiotic Complex help to balance the skin microbiome and help to repair the skin naturally.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Reduce the skin irritation and redness instantly.
Beauty mushroom that capable to maximally hydrate your skin with it’s water holding capacity 500 times its own weight.

excerpt: Mugwort Acne Clay Stick
description: Formulated with Mugwort, a popular ingredient in Korea for treating acne.
Equipped with Niacinamide, Salicylic Acid, and also Centella which can control oil production, deep clean pores, clear blackheads, and soothe inflamed skin.
Easy to use stick form, focuses on calming the skin and reducing redness, cleansing pores and treating acne prone skin, controlling oil and maintaining the skin barrier.
Good coverage, with 1 swipe it can cover one area on the face.
The results of using bruntik are reduced, the pores are smaller, the skin tone is brighter and evener.

name: Mugwort Mask

description: Formulated with Mugwort, popular ingredients from Korea to treat acne. This clay mask can help to reduce acne inflammation and small bumps in 12 hours.
Contain active ingredients such as Niacinamide, Salicylic Acid, and Centella that helps to regulate oil and sebum production, clears out pores, and calms the skin.
This clay mask exfoliate dead skin cells, sebum, and clogged pores while keeping the skin healthy and well maintained.
1 scoop can cover the whole skin.
Routinely used, this mask can reduce acne problems,shrink pores, and makes the skin brighten and more even.

Help to clears out clogged pores, control oil production, and reduce skin inflammation.

name: All Day Light Sunscreen Mist
excerpt: SKINTIFIC All Day Light Sunscreen Mist SPF50 PA++++ Sunscreen Spray Anti UV
description: Sunscreen mist with 0.01nm fine spray, easy to carry and not ruin the makeup after apply.
Invisible texture, not heavy and feels fresh.
Maximum protection with SPF 50+ PA++++, 12 hours protection from UVB that caused sunburn and 16 x prevent UVA that caused signs of aging due to sun exposure.
Microcapsule Technology, give 0.04nm transparent protection layer on the face.
Enriched with 5X effective ingredients including UV Pearls, Ceramide and Centella to protect 99% from UV rays, signs of aging and sunburn.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Microcapsule Technology that makes the sunscreen not feel sticky and greasy.
Moisturized and repair skin barrier with 5x Ceramide.
Supplement for skin collagen as an anti inflammatory.

excerpt: Barrier Protect Serum Sunscreen
description: Contains 5X Ceramide to repair and restore skin barrier.
Contains the latest type of UV Filter which has been patented by BASF Germany (Tinosorb S/M) which can protect the skin from UVA & UVB rays with SPF 50+ PA++++ without irritating the skin.
Has a light texture that absorbs quickly, is non-greasy & provides a moisturizing finish.
Contains Ceramide which can repair and restore the skin barrier.
Additional content of Hyaluronic Acid which can restore and lock moisture in the skin.
This sunscreen is formulated free from Alcohol, Fragrance, and Paraben so it is suitable to use on damaged skin barrier or sensitive skin.

The latest type of UV filter that has been patented by BASF Germany which can provide protection from UV rays without irritating the skin.
Restores and locks moisture in the skin.
